author: Baha'u'llah
source_text:
(١٠) ﴿ يَا ابْنَ الْبَيَانِ ﴾
حِصْنِي أَنْتَ فَادْخُلْ فِيهِ لِتَكُونَ سالِمًا. حُبّي فِيْكَ فَاعْرِفْهُ مِنْكَ لِتَجِدَني قَريبًا.
translation:
(10) O SON OF UTTERANCE!
Thou art My stronghold; enter therein that thou mayest abide in safety. My love is in thee, know it, that thou mayest find Me near unto thee.
